sense.def:
To grasp something
pomeni nekaj trdno prijeti.

A grasp
je trden prijem ali stisk.

seg.quote: The animal had a powerful grasp.

sense.def:
To grasp something complicated
pomeni razumeti nekaj zapletenega.

seg.quote: The concepts were difficult to grasp.
I grasped quite soon what was going on.

sense.def:
To have a grasp of something
pomeni nekaj razumeti.

seg.quote: He had a sound grasp of tactics.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
within one's grasp
, je zelo verjetno, da bo tisto dosegel.

seg.quote: A peaceful solution was within his grasp.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in one's grasp
, tisto držimo ali obvladamo. Kadar nekaj
escapes or slips from one's grasp
, tistega nimamo ali ne obvladamo več.

cit.quote: biti v oblasti; izmakniti se oblasti
